mapper.select: SELECT p_code, p_kind_code, p_name, p_brand, p_price, point, p_regdate, p_comment, p_detail_comment, p_main_img FROM product_tb ORDER BY p_regdate DESC
SELECT p_kind_code, parent_kind_code, kind_name FROM product_kind WHERE parent_kind_code IS NULL ORDER BY p_kind_code ASC
SELECT p_kind_code, parent_kind_code, kind_name FROM product_kind WHERE parent_kind_code=#{parent_kind_code} ORDER BY p_kind_code ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tb(p_code, p_kind_code, p_name, p_brand, p_price, point, p_regdate, p_comment, p_detail_comment, p_main_img) VALUES ( p_code_seq.NEXTVAL, #{p_kind_code}, #{p_name}, (SELECT kind_name FROM product_kind WHERE p_kind_code=#{p_kind_code}), #{p_price}, #{point}, SYSDATE, #{p_comment}, #{p_detail_comment}, #{p_main_img} )
